criteria: Accuracy in describing the short-term effects of alcohol, tobacco, and other drugs.
Accuracy in describing the long-term effects of alcohol, tobacco, and other drugs.
Inclusion of specific substances in describing effects.
Clarity and organization of the description.
descriptions: Demonstrates no understanding or provides inaccurate information about the short-term effects of alcohol, tobacco, and other drugs.
Demonstrates minimal understanding and struggles to accurately describe the short-term effects of alcohol, tobacco, and other drugs.
Demonstrates a basic understanding and describes some short-term effects of alcohol, tobacco, and other drugs, but with inaccuracies.
Demonstrates a satisfactory understanding and accurately describes the main short-term effects of alcohol, tobacco, and other drugs.
Demonstrates a strong understanding and accurately describes a wide range of short-term effects of alcohol, tobacco, and other drugs, providing relevant examples.

Demonstrates a comprehensive understanding and provides a detailed, accurate, and nuanced description of the short-term effects of alcohol, tobacco, and other drugs, including specific examples and potential variations.
Demonstrates no understanding or provides inaccurate information about the long-term effects of alcohol, tobacco, and other drugs.
Demonstrates minimal understanding and struggles to accurately describe the long-term effects of alcohol, tobacco, and other drugs.
Demonstrates a basic understanding and describes some long-term effects of alcohol, tobacco, and other drugs, but with inaccuracies.
Demonstrates a satisfactory understanding and accurately describes the main long-term effects of alcohol, tobacco, and other drugs.
Demonstrates a strong understanding and accurately describes a wide range of long-term effects of alcohol, tobacco, and other drugs, providing relevant examples.

Demonstrates a comprehensive understanding and provides a detailed, accurate, and nuanced description of the long-term effects of alcohol, tobacco, and other drugs, including specific examples and potential variations.
Fails to mention specific substances (alcohol, tobacco, steroids, performance-enhancing drugs, inhalants) when discussing effects.
Mentions only one or two substances, lacking detail on the effects of the others.
Mentions most of the substances but lacks depth in describing their specific effects.
Includes all substances (alcohol, tobacco, steroids, performance-enhancing drugs, inhalants) and describes the effects of each adequately.
Includes all substances and provides specific, detailed effects for each, demonstrating a clear understanding.
Provides an exhaustive list of substances and thoroughly explains the nuances and complexities of each substance's effects, including potential interactions and dependencies.
Description is unclear, disorganized, and difficult to understand.
Description is somewhat unclear and lacks logical organization.
Description is understandable but could benefit from better organization.
Description is clear and organized in a logical manner.
Description is very clear, well-organized, and easy to follow, using appropriate terminology.
Description is exceptionally clear, logically structured, and uses precise language to convey complex information effectively. Demonstrates mastery of communication skills.
